name: OlinLifelongLearning
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: olin lifelong learning
des: Using this skill, you can hear weekly news about WashU Olin. You can also get a weekly insight based on research that WashU Olin Professors are conducting. If you want, you can test your business thinking using weekly mini-cases, which feature benchmarking to other users and a Professor's debrief.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
